page.title: 06Local Services.
page.content: There are many different local {services}which provide for us; Postman:Delivers our letters and bills early in the morning. Milkman:Delivers fresh milk to our doorsteps in the early morning.He also brings other dairy products and fruit juices. Newspaper boy:Delivers the morning 'papers as well as weekly journals. Refuse Collection:Council workmen collect the household rubbish once a week. As well as the small services there are the larger, more important ones which are designed to protect and care for us.These include the local Fire Service,village{Policeman}and Doctor's surgery. All these are an essential part of the community,and ensure that the general public are well served.
